attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Backward dictatorial oppressive secretive unelected unmerited unscrutinisable racist wasteful ruiner of liberty - the royal institution.   Among other things the Royal Prerogative has been used to override the selection of 2 twentieth century prime minsters, turf people from their land all over the world and censor information.  sign it.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
